room_title: Escape room "The Bank Robbery" by Escape Room Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We did the Bank Robbery Room and it was excellent! Eight of us worked together and made it out in under 60 minutes. Great set up with authentic props! The guy who was our host was very nice too! Highly recommend. We will be back to try another room soon!

room_title: Escape room "The Bank Robbery" by Escape Room Buffalo in Buffalo
review: We went with a group of 4. We did Bank Robbery. It was the first time for all of us and we had a great time. We made it out with 2 mins remaining. Can't wait to go back again and try another room
